structure.unit: Registration Of Certain Professions And Occupations

law.catch_line: Denial, Revocation Or Suspension Of Licenses

text.section: conviction by a court of competent jurisdiction of a crime which the board determines to be of such a nature as to render such person unfit to practice as a mental health and human services professional. Said board shall maintain and publish a list of such crimes;

violation of ethical standards of such a nature as to render such individual unfit to practice as a mental health and human services professional. Said board shall publish and maintain such ethical standards;
fraud or misrepresentation in obtaining a license; or
other just and sufficient cause which renders a person unfit to practice as a mental health and human services professional.
